H0.text: Amr Shabana from Egypt is famous for playing which sport. Tennis

H1.text: Amr Shabana from Egypt is famous for playing which sport. Football

H2.text: Amr Shabana from Egypt is famous for playing which sport. Table Tennis

H3.text: Amr Shabana from Egypt is famous for playing which sport. Squash

A4.text: He won the World Open in 2003, 2005, 2007 and 2009, and reached the World No. 1 ranking in 2006.

A5.text: He represented the winning Egyptian team in the 1999 Men's World Team Squash Championships held in Cairo and the 2009 Men's World Team Squash Championships held in Denmark.
